      abstract void Actor.collided(Engine engine, Actor actor)
      When the Engine detects a collision between two actors (player and wall, wall and zombie, etc.) it will generate collision events for all Actors involved.

      void Renderer.registerPlayer(Actor player, double fieldOfView)
      This is how you let the renderer know which actor is the player in the scene.

      Takes a reference to an Actor object and tries to remove it from the World.
